properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where FolderPath endswith "\\EDRSilencer.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "EDRSilencer.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoFileDescription contains "EDRSilencer"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of EDRSilencer, a tool that leverages Windows Filtering Platform (WFP) to block Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) agents from reporting security events to the server based on PE metadata information.
